alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued November 10 at 3:05PM EST until November 11 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Reports from the Bayside communities of the Upper Keys indicate major saltwater flooding ongoing, which is corroborated by National Park Gauges in Florida Bay. Current measured water levels are over a foot above normal high tides, with levels continuing to increase. Peak water levels of a foot and a half above normal high tides, or about a half foot higher than current levels, should be around midnight. * WHERE...Upper Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including ground story homes, ground story enclosures, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
